#Text=Multiple fatalities in bin lorry crash in Glasgow , Scotland
#Text=Monday , December 22 , 2014
#Text=At least six fatalities have resulted this afternoon from a bin lorry crashing in the centre of Glasgow , Scotland .

#Text=The accident occurred at about 1430 UTC today , when the vehicle hit multiple pedestrians on Queen Street , then crashed into Millennium Hotel alongside George Square , located in the city centre .
#Text=BBC Scotland reporter Laura Bicker reported witness accounts the vehicle " careered out of control " and the driver " slumped over the wheel " when the crash occurred .

#Text=It is not yet clear how many people have been killed or injured , although Police Scotland have reported " a number of fatalities and people injured " , with " all casualties , including the driver of the bin lorry " , alternately being taken to Southern General Hospital , Western Infirmary and Glasgow Royal Infirmary .

column1: #Text=They later said on Twitter at least six people have died and eight people are receiving hospital treatment .
#Text=Police Superintendent Stewart Carle said at least seven people suffered serious injury , although the total number of those injured may be greater than this .
#Text=Sky News has reported six fatalities and a larger number of people injured .

#Text=Superintendent Carle further explained that police will investigate what the force has described as a " major incident " for the rest of the day and overnight , although they do not suspect there was any " sinister " activity behind it .
#Text=They told the council to leave Christmas lights on to help the investigation ; the council had offered to switch them off as a mark of respect .
#Text=A winter wonderland attraction has been operating in the area this month .
#Text=Anyone with photos or video is asked to email the police at georgesquareincident@scotland.pnn.police.uk.
#Text=Social media is abuzz with Scots and their loved ones checking each other are safe , and offering condolences .
#Text=" Absolutely gutted for the families of the people killed today , to think[ ... ]

#Text=She added she had  seen people in body bags " and was reluctant to go to get her train in Queen Street Station " incase I see more bodies " .

column1: #Text=" Genuinely do n't care about Xmas shopping now[ , I ] was getting so stressed over silly things when other people are losing their family ... will be thinking of them at Xmas " she said , later telling well-wishers " Thanks so much guys send your good vibes to their families though they 're the ones that really need it " .
#Text=Another local woman said she is " stunned " and she had " stood in that exact spot yesterday afternoon .
